definition: to press against/to support/to prop up/to resist/to equal/to balance/to make up for/to mortgage/to arrive at/to clap (one's hands) lightly (expressing delight) (Taiwan pr. [zhi3] for this sense)

sentences.english: Lemons contain pectin fiber, which assists in fighting hunger cravings.
sentences.chinese: 檸檬富含果膠纖維，它又可以抵抗飢餓。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the relationship between serum resistin levels and type 2 diabetes mellitus.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討人血清抵抗素水平與2型糖尿病的關係。

sentences.english: It is an adaptogen, which means it build resistance to stress and boosts energy.
sentences.chinese: 它有抵抗壓力促進能量產生的功效。

sentences.english: Those markers include inflammation, insulin resistance and oxygen free radicals.
sentences.chinese: 那些指標包括炎症，胰島素抵抗力和氧自由基。

sentences.english: Berries scoop up disease-fighting honors like kids in sports collect trophies.
sentences.chinese: 漿果在抵抗疾病上的榮譽就像孩子收集的體育獎盃。

sentences.english: A soldier in a chariot will resist the Wolf and transform the Cornish people into a Boar.
sentences.chinese: 戰車上的士兵會抵抗狼，把康沃爾人變成野豬。

sentences.english: In addition, Judgements that place debuffs can no longer be resisted.
sentences.chinese: 此外，對目標造成減益效果的審判不再被抵抗。

sentences.english: Different kinds of right to resist have different meanings.
sentences.chinese: 不同層面的抵抗權有不同的含義。

sentences.english: The main pathophysiological changes of patients with PCOS are insulin resistance, hyperinsulinemia and hyperandrogenism.
sentences.chinese: 胰島素抵抗是多囊卵巢綜合徵的主要發病機制之一。

sentences.english: Similar resist also impediment some large-scaled M&A deals.
sentences.chinese: 類似的抵抗破壞了中國的一些大型併購交易。

sentences.english: They want to breake our will to resist by various promises and assurances.
sentences.chinese: 他們希望利用五花八門的許諾和保證瓦解我們的抵抗。

sentences.english: Why is it resistant to secularization?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼伊斯蘭教抵抗世俗化？

sentences.english: The Bani walid Green resistance has killed hundreds of Rebels at Outskirt desert.
sentences.chinese: 綠色抵抗武裝在郊區的沙漠擊斃數百名反對派。

sentences.english: Insulin resistance was calculated using the homeostasis model assessment.
sentences.chinese: 胰島素抵抗性是透過體內平衡模式評估來計算。

sentences.english: But as time passed, resistance forces grew stronger.
sentences.chinese: 但隨着時間的推移，抵抗力量逐漸壯大。

sentences.english: The supersession of the old by the new is a general, eternal and inviolable law of the universe.
sentences.chinese: 新陳代謝是宇宙間普遍的永遠不可抵抗的規律。

definition: to resist/to hold back/to stop/to ward off/to withstand
to put an end to/to annihilate/to cause to perish/to perish/annihilation (in quantum field theory)
to attack/to accuse/to charge/an attack (terrorist or military)
